verses.verse: Dinah, <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Leah, <WH3812> whom she bore <WH3205> to Jacob, <WH3290> went out <WH3318> to see <WH7200> the daughters <WH1323> of the land. <WH776>

Shechem <WH7927> the son <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the Hivite, <WH2340> the prince <WH5387> of the land, <WH776> saw <WH7200> her. <WH3947> He took her, <WH7901> lay with her, <WH6031> and humbled her.

His soul <WH5315> joined <WH1692> to Dinah, <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Jacob, <WH3290> and he loved <WH157> the young lady, <WH5291> and spoke <WH1696> kindly <WH3820> to the young lady. <WH5291>
Shechem <WH7927> spoke <WH559> to his father, <WH1> Hamor, <WH2544> saying, <WH559> "Get <WH3947> me this young lady <WH3207> as a wife. <WH802>"

Now Jacob <WH3290> heard <WH8085> that he had defiled <WH2930> Dinah, <WH1783> his daughter; <WH1323> and his sons <WH1121> were with his livestock <WH4735> in the field. <WH7704> Jacob <WH3290> held his peace <WH2790> until they came. <WH935>
Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> went out <WH3318> to Jacob <WH3290> to talk <WH1696> with him. <WH854>

The sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> in from the field <WH7704> when they heard <WH8085> it. <WH582> The men were grieved, <WH6087> and they were very <WH3966> angry, <WH2734> because he had done <WH6213> folly <WH5039> in Israel <WH3478> in lying <WH7901> with Jacob <WH3290>'s daughter; <WH1323> a which thing ought not to be done. <WH6213>

Hamor <WH2544> talked <WH1696> with them, <WH559> saying, "The soul <WH5315> of my son, <WH1121> Shechem, <WH7927> longs <WH2836> for your daughter. <WH1323> Please give <WH5414> her to him as a wife. <WH802>
Make marriages <WH2859> with us. <WH5414> Give your daughters <WH1323> to us, <WH3947> and take our daughters for yourselves. <WH1323>
You shall dwell <WH3427> with us, <WH776> and the land will be <WH1961> before you. <WH6440> Live <WH3427> and trade <WH5503> in it, <WH270> and get possessions in it."
Shechem <WH7927> said <WH559> to her father <WH1> and to her brothers, <WH251> "Let me find <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in your eyes, <WH5869> and whatever you will tell <WH559> me I will give. <WH5414>
Ask <WH7235> me a great <WH3966> amount <WH4976> for a dowry, <WH4119> and I will give <WH5414> whatever you ask <WH559> of me, <WH5414> but give me the young lady <WH5291> as a wife. <WH802>"

The sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> answered <WH6030> Shechem <WH7927> and Hamor <WH2544> his father <WH1> with deceit, <WH4820> and spoke, <WH1696> because he had defiled <WH2930> Dinah <WH1783> their sister, <WH269>
and said <WH559> to them, <WH3808> "We can't do <WH6213> this thing, <WH1697> to give <WH5414> our sister <WH269> to one <WH376> who is uncircumcised; <WH6190> for that is a reproach to us. <WH2781>
Only on this <WH2063> condition will we consent <WH225> to you. <WH2145> If you will be as we are, that every male of you be circumcised; <WH4135>
then will we give <WH5414> our daughters <WH1323> to you, <WH3947> and we will take your daughters <WH1323> to us, <WH3427> and we will dwell with you, <WH259> and we will become one people. <WH5971>
But if you will not listen <WH8085> to us, <WH4135> to be circumcised, then we will take <WH3947> our sister, <WH1323> and we will be gone. <WH1980>"
Their words <WH1697> pleased <WH3190> Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem, <WH7927> Hamor <WH2544>'s son. <WH1121>

The young man <WH5288> didn't <WH309> wait to do <WH6213> this thing, <WH1697> because he had delight <WH2654> in Jacob <WH3290>'s daughter, <WH1323> and he was honored <WH3513> above all the house <WH1004> of his father. <WH1>
Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem, <WH7927> his son, <WH1121> came <WH935> to the gate <WH8179> of their city, <WH5892> and talked <WH1696> with the men <WH582> of their city, <WH5892> saying, <WH559>

"These men <WH582> are peaceful <WH8003> with <WH854> us. <WH3427> Therefore let them live in the land <WH776> and trade <WH5503> in it. <WH776> For behold, the land is large <WH7342> enough <WH3027> for them. <WH6440> Let us take <WH3947> their daughters <WH1323> to us for wives, <WH802> and let us give <WH5414> them our daughters. <WH1323>

Only on this condition <WH2063> will the men <WH582> consent <WH225> to us to live <WH3427> with us, <WH259> to become one people, <WH5971> if every male <WH2145> among us is circumcised, <WH4135> as they are circumcised. <WH4135>
Won't <WH4735> their livestock and their possessions <WH7075> and all their animals <WH929> be ours? <WH225> Only let us give our consent to them, <WH3427> and they will dwell with us."

All who went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city <WH5892> listened <WH8085> to Hamor, <WH2544> and to Shechem <WH7927> his son; <WH1121> and every male <WH2145> was circumcised, <WH4135> all who went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city. <WH5892>

It happened on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> when they were sore, <WH3510> that two <WH8147> of Jacob <WH3290>'s sons, <WH1121> Simeon <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> Dinah <WH1783>'s brothers, <WH251> each <WH376> took <WH3947> his sword, <WH2719> came <WH935> upon the unsuspecting <WH983> city, <WH5892> and killed <WH2026> all the males. <WH2145>

They killed <WH2026> Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem, <WH7927> his son, <WH1121> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and took <WH3947> Dinah <WH1783> out <WH3947> of Shechem <WH7927>'s house, <WH1004> and went away. <WH3318>
Jacob <WH3290>'s sons <WH1121> came <WH935> on the dead, <WH2491> and plundered <WH962> the city, <WH5892> because they had defiled <WH2930> their sister. <WH269>
They took <WH3947> their flocks, <WH6629> their herds, <WH1241> their donkeys, <WH2543> that which was in the city, <WH5892> that which was in the field, <WH7704>
and all their wealth. <WH2428> They took captive all their little ones <WH2945> and their wives, <WH802> and took <WH7617> as plunder <WH962> everything that was in the house. <WH1004>

Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to Simeon <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> "You have troubled <WH5916> me, <WH3427> to make me odious to the inhabitants of the land, <WH776> among the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites. <WH6522> I am few <WH4962> in number. <WH4557> They will gather themselves together <WH622> against me <WH5221> and strike me, <WH5221> and I will be destroyed, <WH8045> I and my house. <WH1004>"
They said, <WH559> "Should he deal <WH6213> with our sister <WH269> as with a prostitute? <WH2181>"
